publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8143 Stuart McMillan: From Piping to Kayaking—That the Parliament wishes College of Piping shop manager Willie Park the best of success for his solo kayaking journey from Largs to Arran in an effort to raise money for the College of Piping; notes that the college offers students subsidised lessons from profits made by the shop to keep these as affordable as possible; considers that the college has a reputation of high calibre sustained through what it believes to be the diligence and dedication of its staff members and by the goodwill of the piping fraternity worldwide; recognises that this institution has been in place for more than 60 years and has, it considers, greatly aided the promotion of Scotland’s national instrument; appreciates the benefits that thousands of students at home and abroad have gained from this programme, and encourages donations of any amount to support Willie Park’s journey.

S3M-8143 Stuart McMillan: From Piping to Kayaking—That the Parliament wishes College of Piping shop manager Willie Park the best of success for his solo kayaking journey from Largs to Arran in an effort to raise money for the College of Piping; notes that the college offers students subsidised lessons from profits made by the shop to keep these as affordable as possible; considers that the college has a reputation of high calibre sustained through what it believes to be the diligence and dedication of its staff members and by the goodwill of the piping fraternity worldwide; recognises that this institution has been in place for more than 60 years and has, it considers, greatly aided the promotion of Scotland’s national instrument; appreciates the benefits that thousands of students at home and abroad have gained from this programme, and encourages donations of any amount to support Willie Park’s journey. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Anne McLaughlin*, Elaine Smith*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-8143 From Piping to Kayaking (lodged on 10 March 2011) Stewart Maxwell*
S3M-8143 From Piping to Kayaking (lodged on 10 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
